root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 16-8-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: This indicator corresponds to the global SDG target 16.9.1: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
Chỉ tiêu này tương ứng với chỉ tiêu SDG toàn cầu 16.9.1: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority, by age
